isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CAB ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - WINDSHIELD WIPERS AND WASHERS

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPERS AND WASHERS
svcproc.para: Electric windshield wipers have a two-speed motor, may have intermittent wipe feature, and are self-parking when they are turned off. The wiper motor is controlled from an in-dash mounted wiper switch or a turn signal lever mounted switch.
The washer system consists of a pump (510), a fluid reservoir, and a switch (34). Note that with the intermittent option, the washer switch is part of the intermittent wiper switch function.
